item.title: The Best Hostel in Every Major European City
item.description:
The Best Hostel in Every Major European City

Staying at hostels was once a backpacker's rite of passage. After all, nothing builds character like fighting for power outlets,…

item.title: Spotify's Design Lead on Why Side Projects Should Be Stupid
item.description:
Spotify's Design Lead on Why Side Projects Should Be Stupid

Tobias van Schneider lives his life like one big side project. Today, he designs and builds new products for Spotify in New York, but he couldn't have predicted that when he dropped out of school at age 15 to work as an apprentice in a computer shop in Austria.

item.title: Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel
item.description:
Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel

Underwater Dogs - a book containing over 80 unique photographs of dogs underwater snapped by animal photographer Seth Casteel is published on 25th October 2012 by Headline Books, priced £14.99.
